userStories.title: Read build extraction schema and analyze Tacoma World HTML structure
acceptanceCriteria: Read schema/build_extraction_schema.json to understand required output format
Analyze sample HTML files from scraped_builds/tacoma_world/html/
Identify HTML patterns for: year, make, model, title, images, owner
Document HTML selectors and patterns for extraction
userStories.notes: HTML ANALYSIS COMPLETE: Media pages have title, owner, image URL, date. No JSON-LD. Vehicle info must be inferred from titles (e.g., '4.10 PreRunner', '08 RCLT King'). Patterns: media/albums/ for album name, members/ for owner username, media/*/full for image URL.

userStories.title: Create build extraction script for Tacoma World
acceptanceCriteria: Create Python script that reads all HTML files from scraped_builds/tacoma_world/html/
Extract build data from HTML (no JSON-LD expected - need HTML parsing)
Generate build_id using scripts/ralph/build_id_generator.py
Set source_type to 'gallery' (media gallery index)
Infer build_type from context (Off-Road, Prerunner, Work Truck for Tacoma builds)
Extract what data is available: title, images, owner_username
Output to scraped_builds/tacoma_world/builds.json
Include all required fields: build_id, source_type, build_type, build_source, source_url, year, make, model
userStories.notes: Created extract_tacoma_world_builds.py using BeautifulSoup4. Parses title, owner, image URL, album. Infers year/make/model from title patterns (e.g., '08 RCLT' -> 2008 Toyota Tacoma). Data is limited - detail pages require login.

userStories.title: Execute build extraction for all Tacoma World media items
acceptanceCriteria: Run the extraction script against all 618 HTML files
Generate builds.json with all extracted build records
Log extraction summary with counts
Validate output matches schema requirements
userStories.notes: This should process all HTML files and create builds.json. Update sources.json pipeline.builds count when complete.

userStories.title: Verify build extraction and update pipeline
acceptanceCriteria: Verify builds.json contains 618 build records
Validate required fields are present for all builds
Update sources.json: set pipeline.builds = 618
Append learnings to progress.txt
Commit changes: feat: BUILD-004 - Extract all builds from Tacoma World
userStories.notes: After this, Tacoma World will be complete (no mod extraction expected for gallery index data).
